channel.title: CVE Feed for Intel -- Intel Ethernet Controller X710 family and Intel Ethernet Controller XL710 family
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Intel -- Intel Ethernet Controller X710 family and Intel Ethernet Controller XL710 family

item.title: CVE-2016-8105|2024-08-06T02:13:21.852Z -- intel -- intel%20ethernet%20controller%20x710%20family%20and%20intel%20ethernet%20controller%20xl710%20family
item.description: Drivers for the Intel Ethernet Controller X710 and Intel Ethernet Controller XL710 families before version 22.0 are vulnerable to a denial of service in certain layer 2 network configurations.
